results.content: Very professional course and simple explanation!

At first it seems that the course will not great, but after watching it completely, it is great, explain everything so easy to understand.

The only thing I did not like much was the 1 or 2 minutes videos, will be better to have them merged, but that was not the end of the world, so, thank you  for a great course full of knowledge. :)

response.content: Hi Fabian Ballesteros. First of all, I am very happy to see that you liked the course. Thanks for your precious feedbacks.
